name: Street Skater - City
description:
Get skating boy, you have a leaderboard to dominate and a reputation to feed. But be careful of those sharp ledges :S

How to play Street Skater:

- One TAP = Ollie the skateboard
- Two TAPs = Kickflip the skateboard (jumps a tiny bit higher)
- Hold Screen to Manual (And gain more points!)

The rest is simple,
Skate or Die man............

Play Street Skater now on WebGL or via Google Play below

TIP: If it is your first time playing, please give it a minute to load
